high_descs: Turn right, move to the bed and go past the toy bear.
Turn right, move to the night stand that is right of the bed.
anns.task_desc: Look at a pillow by the light of a lamp.

high_descs: Turn right, head to the right side of the bed, turn left to face the pillow on the bed.
Pick up the pillow on the right side of the bed.
Turn right, bring the pillow to the lamp on the small table.
Turn on the lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Examine the pillow in the light of the lamp on the table.

high_descs: Go right and then turn left to face the bed while standing in front of the night stand on the right of the bed.
Pick the closest pink pillow up from the bed.
Turn to the right and face the lamp on the table.
anns.task_desc: Pick up a pillow and turn a lamp on.
